posts.title: Zombie Hand Goblet
posts.content: Satisfy your lust for zombie paraphernalia with this zombie hand goblet. This hand painted 7 ounce piece will make you feel like a zombie’s rotting hand is coming for your face everytime you take a sip or whenever you go to check the legs on your wine.

posts.title: Tree Man Incense Burner
posts.content: Let the fine smoke fill your home with this Ent Tree Incense Burner. This unique burner uses cone shaped incense candles and slowly releases smoke from the top of his head, giving off a very cool effect while also making your home smell great.

posts.title: Coffee Makes Me Poop Mug
posts.content: Everyone loves poop humor. So crack everyone up in the break room by sipping your morning roast from this “coffee makes me poop” mug. Crafted from high quality ceramic, it’s shaped like a big healthy brown turd and holds up to 14 ounces of your favorite beverage.

posts.title: Horse Head Mask
posts.content: Frighten and intrigue everyone around you with this creepy horse head mask. This realistic latex mask is perfect for costume parties, first dates, or even job interviews where you want to make a bold first impression to your potential boss and co-workers.

posts.title: Jello Shot Syringe Kit
posts.content: Keep your buzz going strong throughout the day by self medicating profusely with the Jello shot syringe kit. Once the medicine is prepared for consumption, the sweet concoction is to be enjoyed orally every 15 minutes or as needed for maximum inebriation.

posts.title: Remote Control Garbage Can
posts.content: Keep your room looking clean without having to make constant trips to the trash can by getting your hands on the remote control garbage can. With the easy to use controller, you’ll be able to direct this battery powered appliance directly to where the mess is.

posts.title: Curved Shower Rod
posts.content: Add some extra elbow room inside your shower without needing costly renovations by using this curved shower rod. The curved design provides added room for you to move around in the shower and features an easy installation process that requires no tools.

posts.title: Bald Eagle Fighter Pilot Shirt
posts.content: Show off your patriotism like a true red blooded ‘Murican with the bald eagle fighter pilot t-shirt. Nothing says you’re from the greatest country in the world quite like a bald eagle fighter pilot posing against the old red, white, and blue while kick-ass jets soar in the background.

posts.title: Toilet Targets
posts.content: Piss on the faces of your friends, family, and loved ones with the toilet targets protector. The targets are easy to install and are designed to encase a picture of your choosing in a waterproof bubble so that you can take aim and empty the entire tank.

posts.title: Knight Helmet Hat
posts.content: Look down right chivalrous while staying warm with this crocheted knight helmet hat. With its thick padded armor and functional moving visor, the knight helmet hat is sure to land you a damsel or two. You’ll feel just like a real knight, minus the whole noble birth thing.

posts.title: Kinetic Moldable Sand
posts.content: Enjoy constructing killer sandcastles without any of the mess of regular sand by building them with this kinetic moldable sand. This non-toxic hypoallergenic sand never dries out and sticks onto itself – allowing you to build gravity-defying imaginative structures.

posts.title: Hillary Clinton Nutcracker
posts.content: There’s no nut too large to crack for old Hilldawg. This Hillary Clinton nutcracker stands at a commanding nine inches tall, comes in a conservative navy-blue power suit, and boasts a pair of killer thighs lined with heavy-duty steel teeth.
